other_attributes.description: Use for other attributes for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes

___source_url.description: Place where this fact can be verified

___end_date.description: Latest known date this was known to be a subsidiary

___percentage_controlled.description: Percentage of the subsidiary that is controlled (if known), either directly or indirectly

___subsidiary_identifier.description: Any unique id for the subsidiary that might be provided in the source

___direct.description: Is the control relationship direct or indirect (if unknown, leave blank)?

___sample_date.description: Date on which this fact was known to be true

___start_date.description: Earliest known date this was known to be a subsidiary

___parent_identifier.description: Any unique ID for the controlling company

___parent_jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction where controlling company is based
